mapper.insert: insert into mdm_customers(customer_id,customer_name,customer_address,customer_link,customer_type, area_id,bank_name,bank_account_num,create_date,create_by) values (#{customer_id},'${customer_name}','${customer_address}', NULL #{customer_link}, NULL #{customer_type}, NULL #{area_id}, NULL #{bank_name}, NULL #{bank_account_num}, SYSDATE(), NULL #{create_by} )
mapper.update: update mdm_customers set customer_name=NULL customer_name=#{customer_name}, customer_address=NULL customer_address=#{customer_address}, customer_link=NULL customer_link=#{customer_link}, customer_type=NULL customer_type=#{customer_type}, area_id=NULL area_id=#{area_id}, bank_name=NULL bank_name=#{bank_name}, bank_account_num=NULL bank_account_num=#{bank_account_num} where customer_id=#{customer_id}
mapper.select: SELECT u.*,sa.merger_name as area_name FROM mdm_customers u left join sys_area sa on u.area_id=sa.`code` where u.customer_id = #{customer_id}

SELECT u.*,sa.merger_name as area_name FROM mdm_customers u left join sys_area sa on u.area_id=sa.`code` where 1=1
and u.customer_name='${customer_name}'
and u.customer_address like '%${customer_address}%'
and u.customer_link='${customer_link}'
and u.customer_type like '%${customer_type}%'

SELECT count(1) FROM mdm_customers where customer_name='${customer_id}'
and customer_id != '${customer_id}'
